articles.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot

articles.title: Meet Boti: The AI assistant transforming how the citizens of Buenos Aires access government information with Amazon Bedrock
articles.description: This post describes the agentic AI assistant built by the Government of the City of Buenos Aires and the GenAIIC to respond to citizens’ questions about government procedures. The solution consists of two primary components: an input guardrail system that helps prevent the system from responding to harmful user queries and a government procedures agent that retrieves relevant information and generates responses.
articles.author: Julieta Rappan, Macarena Blasi, María Candela Blanco, Leandro Micchele
articles.content: This post describes the agentic AI assistant built by the Government of the City of Buenos Aires and the GenAIIC to respond to citizens’ questions about government procedures. The solution consists of two primary components: an input guardrail system that helps prevent the system from responding to harmful user queries and a government procedures agent that retrieves relevant information and generates responses.

articles.title: Inline code nodes now supported in Amazon Bedrock Flows in public preview
articles.description: We are excited to announce the public preview of support for inline code nodes in Amazon Bedrock Flows. With this powerful new capability, you can write Python scripts directly within your workflow, alleviating the need for separate AWS Lambda functions for simple logic. This feature streamlines preprocessing and postprocessing tasks (like data normalization and response formatting), simplifying generative AI application development and making it more accessible across organizations.
articles.author: Shubhankar Sumar
articles.content: We are excited to announce the public preview of support for inline code nodes in Amazon Bedrock Flows. With this powerful new capability, you can write Python scripts directly within your workflow, alleviating the need for separate AWS Lambda functions for simple logic. This feature streamlines preprocessing and postprocessing tasks (like data normalization and response formatting), simplifying generative AI application development and making it more accessible across organizations.

articles.title: How to deploy Elastic Agents in air-gapped environments
articles.description: The problem: When "just download it" isn't an optionPicture this scenario: You need to deploy Elastic Agents in sensitive/classified networks, critical infrastructure, or financial systems with strict network isolation policies. The network is locked down — no internet access, no external downloads, and definitely no calling home to artifacts.elastic.co — when an Elastic Agent needs an update or when Endpoint security requires the latest threat detection artifacts.This is the reality for many...

articles.title: Beyond the basics: A comprehensive foundation model selection framework for generative AI
articles.description: As the model landscape expands, organizations face complex scenarios when selecting the right foundation model for their applications. In this blog post we present a systematic evaluation methodology for Amazon Bedrock users, combining theoretical frameworks with practical implementation strategies that empower data scientists and machine learning (ML) engineers to make optimal model selections.
articles.author: Sandeep Singh
articles.content: As the model landscape expands, organizations face complex scenarios when selecting the right foundation model for their applications. In this blog post we present a systematic evaluation methodology for Amazon Bedrock users, combining theoretical frameworks with practical implementation strategies that empower data scientists and machine learning (ML) engineers to make optimal model selections.

articles.title: Celebrating More Than 2 Million Developers Embracing NVIDIA Robotics
articles.description: We’re celebrating the more than 2 million developers now using the NVIDIA robotics stack. These builders are reshaping industries across manufacturing, food delivery, agriculture, healthcare, facilities maintenance and much more.

articles.title: OpenAI's GPT-5 Now Generally Available on Microsoft Azure AI Foundry
articles.description: Microsoft and OpenAI launched GPT-5 on the Azure AI Foundry, revolutionizing enterprise AI with its advanced reasoning and task-specific model orchestration. This suite enhances applications like Microsoft 365 Copilot and GitHub Copilot, enabling seamless interactions and high-quality outputs tailored for real-world scenarios. GPT-5 empowers organizations to drive AI transformation efficiently. By Steef-Jan Wiggers
articles.author: Steef-Jan Wiggers
articles.content: Microsoft and OpenAI launched GPT-5 on the Azure AI Foundry, revolutionizing enterprise AI with its advanced reasoning and task-specific model orchestration. GPT-5 empowers organizations to drive AI transformation efficiently. By Steef-Jan Wiggers

articles.title: Opinion: Trusting an unverified AI agent is like handing your keys to a drunk graduate
articles.description: AI agents are now being embedded across core business functions globally. Soon, these agents could be scheduling our lives, making key decisions, and negotiating deals on our behalf. The prospect is exciting and ambitious, but it also begs the question: who’s actually supervising them? Over half (51%) of companies have deployed AI agents, and Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff has targeted a billion agents by the end of the year. Despite their growing influence, verification testing is notably absent....
articles.author: Calum Chase

articles.title: Why AI Benchmarks Don’t Predict Consumer Success: The Gemini Paradox
articles.description: As someone who works with AI, my toolkit is rarely limited to a single provider. I regularly switch between models from Google (Gemini), OpenAI (GPT-X), Anthropic (Claude), and Grok. I also work with increasingly capable open-weight models from Alibaba (Qwen), DeepSeek, and Moonshot AI (kimi). The right model is always use-case specific, but before startingContinue reading "Why AI Benchmarks Don’t Predict Consumer Success: The Gemini Paradox" The post Why AI Benchmarks Don’t Predict Consumer...
